fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Assassinate a player with your unparalleled stealth and deadly precision.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Successful assassinations reveal the following information about the target:
- Role and Will (if cleaned)
- Nightly actions performed by the target.
- Visitors to the target each night.
- Detailed actions of each visitor, similar to a spy bug.
- Previous roles if the target was converted.

fields.name: Special Ability:
fields.value: - Shadow Walk: Once per game, you can activate your innate ability to blend into the shadows, becoming immune to all forms of detection and manipulation for one night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Uphold justice by eliminating threats to the town.
